original: rgyal ba'i mtshan nyid can yin pas na rnam par rgyal ba ste de nyid ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i mtshan nyid can yin pas na rnam par rgyal ba ste de nyid ni rdo rje'o //
translated: The one who has the nature of being victorious over the four demons by means of knowledge is the vajra of victory, i.e., the vajra of victory over the four demons.

original: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of “object,” etc., has been explained.

original: shes rab ye shes mchog thob pa //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes mchog thob pa //
translated: The one who has attained the supreme knowledge-gnosis

original: zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi mchog ni chos bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi mchog ni chos bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The supreme wisdom is that which has the characteristic of the selflessness of phenomena.

original: zab mo'i tshul ni ston pa po//
analyzed: zab mo'i tshul ni ston pa po//
translated: The one who teaches the profound way

original: zhes bya ba ni dngos po rnams gnyis su med par ston pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dngos po rnams gnyis su med par ston pa'o //
translated: is the one who teaches the non-duality of things.

original: zur phud gsum zhes bya ba ni zur phud gsum dang ldan pas na de skad ces gsungs so //
analyzed: zur phud gsum zhes bya ba ni zur phud gsum dang ldan pas na de skad ces gsungs so //
translated: The three locks are so called because they possess three locks.

original: 'jo sgeg thabs kyis rol pa ste //
analyzed: 'jo sgeg thabs kyis rol pa ste //
translated: The one who plays with the method of grace

original: zhes bya ba ni shas cher sgeg pa'i stang stabs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shas cher sgeg pa'i stang stabs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: is the one who possesses the gait of grace.

original: shes rab 'chang zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab 'chang zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o //
translated: The one who holds wisdom is the one who holds the book of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab yon tan mchog gis bklubs //
analyzed: shes rab yon tan mchog gis bklubs //
translated: The one who is covered with the supreme qualities of wisdom

original: zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lha'i nga rgyal gyis brgyan par byas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lha'i nga rgyal gyis brgyan par byas pa'o //
translated: is the practitioner who is adorned with the divine pride of noble Manjushri.

original: sangs rgyas 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni 'tshang rgya bar yid la 'dod pas so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni 'tshang rgya bar yid la 'dod pas so //
translated: The one who desires Buddhahood is the one who desires enlightenment.

original: 'jam pa'i rab mchog gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jam pa ni byis pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i rab mchog gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jam pa ni byis pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba'o //
translated: The one called Mañjuśrī and so on. He is gentle because he has the appearance of a child.

original: de nyid phul du byung bas na rab po //
analyzed: de nyid phul du byung bas na rab po //
translated: He is supreme because he is the best.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi des par 'byed pa'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na mchog go //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi des par 'byed pa'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na mchog go //
translated: He is the best because he has the nature of the wisdom and knowledge that penetrates all the Tathāgatas.

original: shes rab dang ye shes ni gnyis kyis rnam par dben pa'i shes rab dang ye shes so //
analyzed: shes rab dang ye shes ni gnyis kyis rnam par dben pa'i shes rab dang ye shes so //
translated: Wisdom and knowledge are wisdom and knowledge free from the two.

original: rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'jig pas na rdo rje ste de rtogs pa'i tshul gyis snang zhing rab tu gsal bas na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'jig pas na rdo rje ste de rtogs pa'i tshul gyis snang zhing rab tu gsal bas na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is a vajra because he destroys all conceptual thoughts. He is called the Bodhisattva Mañjuśrī because he appears and shines forth by the method of realizing that.

original: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of object and so on has already been explained.

original: de la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma rnams bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma rnams bstan pa yin no //
translated: And so on and so forth refers to the remaining bodhisattvas.

original: grangs med pa zhes bya ba ni tshig 'di grangs med pa nyid ston pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang mang po ston pa ste /
analyzed: grangs med pa zhes bya ba ni tshig 'di grangs med pa nyid ston pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang mang po ston pa ste /
translated: The incalculable is not taught to be an incalculable number, but rather a great number.

original: de rnams ni bzhis ma tshang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' stong yod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams ni bzhis ma tshang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' stong yod par shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that there are a thousand Bodhisattvas, less four, who are incalculable.

original: sa bon yig 'bru rnams las 'khrungs //
analyzed: sa bon yig 'bru rnams las 'khrungs //
translated: They are born from the seed-syllables.

original: zhes bya ba ni ming gi yi ge'i dang po las byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ming gi yi ge'i dang po las byung ba'o //
translated: They are born from the first letters of the names.

original: ye shes phyag rgya'i sbyor ba can //
analyzed: ye shes phyag rgya'i sbyor ba can //
translated: They are endowed with the union of the knowledge-seal.

original: zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa bsgom pa'i rim pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa bsgom pa'i rim pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: They are endowed with the process of meditation on the moon, vajra, etc.

original: sna tshogs nyams kyis dga' bar mdzad //
analyzed: sna tshogs nyams kyis dga' bar mdzad //
translated: They delight with the various moods.

original: ces bya ba ni sgeg pa la sogs pa'i gar gyi nyams kyis de la mngon par zhen pa @211b rnams gar stabs kyis nyams de dang des dga' ba skyed par mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sgeg pa la sogs pa'i gar gyi nyams kyis de la mngon par zhen pa @211b rnams gar stabs kyis nyams de dang des dga' ba skyed par mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: They delight those who are attached to them with the moods of dance, such as gracefulness, by means of those moods. This is the meaning.

original: gsang sngags zlos pas bsgom par bya //
analyzed: gsang sngags zlos pas bsgom par bya //
translated: The reciter of mantras should meditate on them.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dir byed pa'i tshig med par byas nas mtshams sbyar te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dir byed pa'i tshig med par byas nas mtshams sbyar te /
translated: Here, having made a connection without a verbal root,

original: sa bon yig 'bru rnams las 'khrungs //
analyzed: sa bon yig 'bru rnams las 'khrungs //
translated: [the verse] says, “arisen from the seed syllables.”

original: zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pa spros te //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pa spros te //
translated: And, “having emanated the buddhas and so forth,

original: so so'i sngags brjod pa ni yi ge de las spro ba dang bsdu ba dang gnas dang brtan par gyur par rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rtag tu dran zhing bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: so so'i sngags brjod pa ni yi ge de las spro ba dang bsdu ba dang gnas dang brtan par gyur par rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rtag tu dran zhing bsgom par bya'o //
translated: the yogins should always remember and meditate on the emanation, gathering, abiding, and stability from those syllables.”

original: 'dir bsgres te bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang phyag dang po gnyis ni bsam gtan gyi phyag rgyar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir bsgres te bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang phyag dang po gnyis ni bsam gtan gyi phyag rgyar bya'o //
translated: Here, all those bodhisattvas who are taught in the extended [version of the tantra] should have the first two hands in the meditative equipoise mudra.

original: g-yas kyi gnyis pas ni mchog sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas kyi gnyis pas ni mchog sbyin pa'o //
translated: The second right hand is in the boon-granting mudra.

original: g-yon gyi gnyis pas ni rang gi phyag rgya rgyal mtshan 'dzin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
analyzed: g-yon gyi gnyis pas ni rang gi phyag rgya rgyal mtshan 'dzin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
translated: The second left hand should hold the banner, their own mudra. This is the instruction.

original: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhes bya ba ni de dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhes bya ba ni de dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: “Mañjughoṣa” is connected with that.

original: gzi brjid dang ldan zhes bya ba ni 'bar ma ste zhes bya ba dang sbyar te /
analyzed: gzi brjid dang ldan zhes bya ba ni 'bar ma ste zhes bya ba dang sbyar te /
translated: She is called radiant and is associated with flames.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang gdan du ldan pas na de skad ces gsungs so //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang gdan du ldan pas na de skad ces gsungs so //
translated: She has the light and seat of the orb of the sun.

original: mdog ni dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra //
analyzed: mdog ni dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra //
translated: Her color is like a summer rain cloud.

original: zhes bya ba ni sku mdog sdo nag go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sku mdog sdo nag go //
translated: Her body is dark blue.

original: sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
translated: She is adorned with snake ornaments.

original: zhes bya ba ni mtha' yas dang rig ldan nag pos dbu skra bcings pa 'jog po gser mdog dang ldan pas ni rna rgyan byas pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mtha' yas dang rig ldan nag pos dbu skra bcings pa 'jog po gser mdog dang ldan pas ni rna rgyan byas pa /
translated: She has a head ornament of Ananta and Vasuki, and earrings of Takshaka.

original: padma chen po gser btso ma'i mdog dang ldan pas ni lag gdub byas pa /
analyzed: padma chen po gser btso ma'i mdog dang ldan pas ni lag gdub byas pa /
translated: She has bracelets of Padma, who is the color of pure gold.

original: karko ta mdog dkar bas ni se ral khar byas pa /
analyzed: karko ta mdog dkar bas ni se ral khar byas pa /
translated: She has a sash of Karkota, who is white.

original: nor can mdog padma dmar po lta bus ni ska rags byas la /
analyzed: nor can mdog padma dmar po lta bus ni ska rags byas la /
translated: She has a belt of Mahapadma, who is the color of a red lotus.

original: dung skyong dang padma mdog dkar ba dang dmar bas ni rkang gdub byas pa ste de dag thams cad kyang gdengs ka bskyil pa dang nor bu dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dung skyong dang padma mdog dkar ba dang dmar bas ni rkang gdub byas pa ste de dag thams cad kyang gdengs ka bskyil pa dang nor bu dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The anklets are made of conch shells, white and red lotuses, all of which are coiled and have gems.

original: rol pa'i stang stabs can zhes bya ba ni rol pa'i stang stabs dang ldan pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rol pa'i stang stabs can zhes bya ba ni rol pa'i stang stabs dang ldan pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The stance is the dancing stance.

original: ma he chibs zhes bya ba ni 'di skad gsungs su zin kyang rgyud chen po'i rjes su 'brangs nas ma hes nye bar mtshon pa gshin rje chung ma dang bcas pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ma he chibs zhes bya ba ni 'di skad gsungs su zin kyang rgyud chen po'i rjes su 'brangs nas ma hes nye bar mtshon pa gshin rje chung ma dang bcas pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Riding a water buffalo is said, but following the great tantra, one should understand that Yama with his consort is indicated by the water buffalo.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni ma hes nye bar mtshon pas gshin rnge'o //🔽dbu yi steng na mi 'khrugs bzhugs //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni ma hes nye bar mtshon pas gshin rnge'o // dbu yi steng na mi 'khrugs bzhugs //
translated: The him is Yama.

original: zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i dbu'i steng na bzhugs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i dbu'i steng na bzhugs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Above his head is Akṣobhya means that he is called that because Akṣobhya resides above his head.

original: steng na sku gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni steng gi char sku gsum gyi bdag @212a * //
analyzed: steng na sku gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni steng gi char sku gsum gyi bdag @212a * //
translated: The three bodies above and so forth means that above him is the three bodies, which are the three heads of the three bodies.

original: nyid du gnas pa 'jam dpal gyis legs par brgyan par byas pa la de'i 'og tu mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: nyid du gnas pa 'jam dpal gyis legs par brgyan par byas pa la de'i 'og tu mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Then, after that, is Akasagarbhe.

original: mda' yang gsor zhes bya ba ni mda' gsor bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: mda' yang gsor zhes bya ba ni mda' gsor bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: The bow is drawn means that the bow is drawn.

original: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can //
analyzed: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can //
translated: The left hand is a threatening gesture with a noose.

original: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur la mdzub mo bsgreng bas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //🔽lha mo yis ni g-yas nas 'khyud //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur la mdzub mo bsgreng bas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o // lha mo yis ni g-yas nas 'khyud //
translated: The left hand is a vajra fist with the index finger extended, holding a noose.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa la g-yas logs na gnas pa'i lha mo mdog de nyid dang 'dra bas g-yon gyis 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa la g-yas logs na gnas pa'i lha mo mdog de nyid dang 'dra bas g-yon gyis 'khyud pa'o //
translated: The goddess embraces from the right and so forth. The goddess, who is on the right side and has the same color, embraces from the left.

original: lha mo de'i g-yas na autpala sngon po 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: lha mo de'i g-yas na autpala sngon po 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The goddess on the right holds a blue utpala.

original: g-yon pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la g-yon logs na gnas pa'i lha mos g-yas kyis 'khyud la de'i g-yon na ni padma dkar po thogs pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la g-yon logs na gnas pa'i lha mos g-yas kyis 'khyud la de'i g-yon na ni padma dkar po thogs pa'o //
translated: The left and so forth. The goddess on the left side embraces with the right hand, and on her left is a white lotus.

original: sngar ma bred nas phyag kyang 'tshal //
analyzed: sngar ma bred nas phyag kyang 'tshal //
translated: Not frightened before, he also pays homage.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jigs shang bred nas phyag 'tshal zhing mgo btud pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jigs shang bred nas phyag 'tshal zhing mgo btud pa ste /
translated: Thus,frightened and terrified, he prostrates and bows his head.

original: de nyid kyis na sngar ma ste myos par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na sngar ma ste myos par gyur pa'o //
translated: By that very fact, he is formerly intoxicated.

original: 'od zer dmar po 'bar dang bcas //
analyzed: 'od zer dmar po 'bar dang bcas //
translated: He has blazing red light rays.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'od zer dmar ba ste de nyid kyis na 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bskor ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'od zer dmar ba ste de nyid kyis na 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bskor ba'o //
translated: He has blazing red light rays means that he has red light rays. By that very fact, he is surrounded by a halo of blazing light.

original: sangs rgyas sprin 'phros thob par mdzad //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprin 'phros thob par mdzad //
translated: He causes the attainment of the emanation of the clouds of buddhas.

original: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sprin rnams 'phro bas mngon par 'dod pa'i don gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyis kun nas thob cing rnyed bar mdzad pas na sangs rgyas sprin 'phros thob par mdzad de sprul pa'i sprin gyis sems can don mdzad ces bya ba'i don
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sprin rnams 'phro bas mngon par 'dod pa'i don gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyis kun nas thob cing rnyed bar mdzad pas na sangs rgyas sprin 'phros thob par mdzad de sprul pa'i sprin gyis sems can don mdzad ces bya ba'i don
translated: He causes the attainment of the emanation of the clouds of buddhas means that he causes the attainment and acquisition of the intended objects by the beings to be tamed through the emanation of the clouds of buddhas. The meaning of he causes the attainment of the emanation of the clouds of buddhas is he acts for the benefit of sentient beings through emanated clouds.

original: to // bsgoms nas su zhes bya ba ni 'dir ji skad du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par bsgoms pa 'di bdag por 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: to // bsgoms nas su zhes bya ba ni 'dir ji skad du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par bsgoms pa 'di bdag por 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Having meditated is to be supplied with having meditated with the characteristics as stated, this is the lord.

original: nyal lam zhes bya ba ni yang gi sgras ni bsdad pa'am sdod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: nyal lam zhes bya ba ni yang gi sgras ni bsdad pa'am sdod par shes par bya'o //
translated: Whether sleeping or the word or is to be understood as standing or sitting.

original: kun du zos shing zhes bya ba 'dis ni bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig bstan to //
analyzed: kun du zos shing zhes bya ba 'dis ni bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig bstan to //
translated: Having eaten by this is taught the vow of eating.

original: legs par bsams te zhes bya ba ni gdug pa rnams tshar gcod cing 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: legs par bsams te zhes bya ba ni gdug pa rnams tshar gcod cing 'jig pa'o //
translated: Having well reflected is to destroy and annihilate the wicked.

original: 'dod pa lnga'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa dang / mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid can gyi gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'dod pa'i bdag nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bu'am ma skyes par mos pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa mchod pa'i yid la
analyzed: 'dod pa lnga'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa dang / mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid can gyi gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'dod pa'i bdag nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bu'am ma skyes par mos pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa mchod pa'i yid la
translated: In the verse that begins, “The five sense objects,” the five sense objects are those that have the nature of form, sound, smell, taste, and touch, which are the nature of Vairocana, Ratnasaṃbhava, Amitābha, Amoghasiddhi, and Akṣobhya.

original: byed pas nye bar longs spyod na gos pa med cing @212b sdig pa'i snod du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byed pas nye bar longs spyod na gos pa med cing @212b sdig pa'i snod du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If one enjoys them with the mental state of offering to the tathāgatas and so on, preceded by the conviction that they are like illusory persons or unborn, one will not be defiled and will not become a vessel for misdeeds.

original: de bas na chos thams cad la brten pa med pas na nam mkha' lta bur zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na chos thams cad la brten pa med pas na nam mkha' lta bur zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since all phenomena are without support, it is said that they are like space.

original: de skad du gzhan dag las kyang /
analyzed: de skad du gzhan dag las kyang /
translated: It is said in other sūtras:

original: chags pa ye shes 'dod pa yis //
analyzed: chags pa ye shes 'dod pa yis //
translated: Those who desire wisdom and are attached

original: rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan bsten //
analyzed: rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan bsten //
translated: should always rely on the sense pleasures.

original: byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par bya //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par bya //
translated: They should please the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub dpa' bo chags pas bya //
analyzed: byang chub dpa' bo chags pas bya //
translated: The hero of enlightenment is made of passion.

original: gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
analyzed: gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
translated: Having understood the three aspects of form,

original: mchod pa byed pas mchod par bya //
analyzed: mchod pa byed pas mchod par bya //
translated: the worshipper should make offerings.

original: bcom ldan de nyid sna tshogs pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan de nyid sna tshogs pa //
translated: The Blessed One is of various natures,

original: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhi //
translated: the four buddhas are Vairocana.

original: sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
analyzed: sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
translated: Having understood the three aspects of sound,

original: lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya //
analyzed: lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya //
translated: one should offer it to the deities.

original: de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa //
analyzed: de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa //
translated: That very Blessed One is of various natures,

original: sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso //
translated: the chief buddha is Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: dril rnam gsum shes byas nas //
analyzed: dril rnam gsum shes byas nas //
translated: Having understood the three aspects of smell,

original: sangs rgyas la sogs dbul bar bya //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la sogs dbul bar bya //
translated: one should offer it to the buddhas and so forth.

original: de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa //
analyzed: de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa //
translated: That very one is of various natures,

original: 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso //
analyzed: 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso //
translated: the chief buddha is Amoghasiddhi.

original: ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
analyzed: ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
translated: Having understood the three aspects of taste,

original: lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya //
analyzed: lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya //
translated: one should offer it to the deities.

original: de nyid sangs rgyas sna tshogs pa //
analyzed: de nyid sangs rgyas sna tshogs pa //
translated: That very one is of various natures,

original: sangs rgyas thogs med rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thogs med rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: the chief buddha is Akṣobhya.

original: reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
analyzed: reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
translated: Having understood the three aspects of touch,

original: bdag gi rigs la dbul bar bya //
analyzed: bdag gi rigs la dbul bar bya //
translated: one should offer it to one’s own family.

original: de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can //
analyzed: de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can //
translated: That very one is the Blessed One with a vajra,

original: mi bskyod pa yi tshul brnyes pa'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa yi tshul brnyes pa'o //
translated: He has attained the state of Akshobhya.

original: gzugs dang sgra dang ro la sogs //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra dang ro la sogs //
translated: Form, sound, taste, and so forth

original: rtag tu sems ni sbyar bar bya //🔽'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
analyzed: rtag tu sems ni sbyar bar bya // 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
translated: are always to be applied by the mind.🔽This is the essence of the secret

original: gsang ba snying po bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba snying po bsdus pa'o //
translated: of all the Buddhas.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: And so forth.

original: gshed byed ces bya ba la sogs pa la gshed byed ni 'phrog pa'i bdag nyid do //🔽de nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad byed pa'am /
analyzed: gshed byed ces bya ba la sogs pa la gshed byed ni 'phrog pa'i bdag nyid do // de nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad byed pa'am /
translated: The all-destroyer and so forth. The all-destroyer is the nature of the snatcher.

original: gdug pa rnams 'joms pa'i phyir slong bar byed pas na gshed byed thams cad slong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gdug pa rnams 'joms pa'i phyir slong bar byed pas na gshed byed thams cad slong bar byed pa'o //
translated: That very [mantra] is the all-destroyer of all, because it acts in all ways, or because it destroys the wicked.

original: de nyid ni thogs pa med pa'i phyir ye shes kyang yin la rdo rje yang yin pas de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni thogs pa med pa'i phyir ye shes kyang yin la rdo rje yang yin pas de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is called the all-destroying wisdom-vajra because it is unobstructed.

original: yang na gshed byed thams cad slong bar byed cing skyed par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje yin pas de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: yang na gshed byed thams cad slong bar byed cing skyed par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje yin pas de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Or it is called that because it is the wisdom-vajra that destroys and produces all destroyers.

original: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis gshin rjer 'jig rten du grags pa gsod pa ni zlog par mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis gshin rjer 'jig rten du grags pa gsod pa ni zlog par mdzad pa ste /
translated: The Blessed One himself is known in the world as Yama, the killer.

original: 'dul ba'i thabs dang bcas pas nyon mongs pa'i gnas las bzlog ste /
analyzed: 'dul ba'i thabs dang bcas pas nyon mongs pa'i gnas las bzlog ste /
translated: He turns away from the state of the afflictions, together with the means of disciplining,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la 'jug par mdzad pas de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la 'jug par mdzad pas de skad ces bya'o //
translated: and he causes entry into the path of the Tathagatas.

original: de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of “having that as its object” and so forth has already been explained.

original: @213a * // mi'u thung zhes bya ba ni mi thung gi khyad par dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: @213a * // mi'u thung zhes bya ba ni mi thung gi khyad par dang ldan pa'o //
translated: “Dwarf” means having the distinction of being a dwarf.

original: 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor te nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor te nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The orb of red light is the orb of the sun.

original: de'i 'od zer de la mnga' bas na de skad ces bya ste /🔽'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po rab 'phro ba //
analyzed: de'i 'od zer de la mnga' bas na de skad ces bya ste / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po rab 'phro ba //
translated: He is called that because he has power over that light.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he radiates a red orb of light.

original: rol pa'i stabs kyis padmar bzhugs//
analyzed: rol pa'i stabs kyis padmar bzhugs//
translated: He sits on a lotus in a playful posture.

original: zhes bya ba la rol pa'i stang stabs kyis padma'i gdan la bzhugs pas de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rol pa'i stang stabs kyis padma'i gdan la bzhugs pas de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is called that because he sits on a lotus seat in a playful posture.

original: shes rab mthar byed ces bya ba'i don gyis na padma'i steng na khyab 'jug chung ma dang bcas pa de'i steng na bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab mthar byed ces bya ba'i don gyis na padma'i steng na khyab 'jug chung ma dang bcas pa de'i steng na bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the name Prajñāntakṛt is that on a lotus is Viṣṇu with his wife, and on top of that is the Blessed One, just as before.

original: rnam par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa'o//
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa'o//
translated: The meaning of distorted is that the fangs of the face are bared.

original: tshems kyis sgros kyang mnan zhes bya ba ni mche bas ma mchu'i sgros gnon par mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: tshems kyis sgros kyang mnan zhes bya ba ni mche bas ma mchu'i sgros gnon par mdzad pa ste /
translated: And pressing the lip with the fangs means that the lip is pressed with the fangs.

original: zhal gsum las g-yon gyi zhal steng gi tshems kyis sgros mnan pa'o //
analyzed: zhal gsum las g-yon gyi zhal steng gi tshems kyis sgros mnan pa'o //
translated: Of the three faces, the upper lip of the left face is pressed with the fangs.

original: sna tshogs rgyan gyis 'bar ba ste //
analyzed: sna tshogs rgyan gyis 'bar ba ste //
translated: Blazing with various ornaments.

original: zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa ni sgeg pa la sogs pas yan lag 'gyur bar byed pa'i gar stabs rnams dang ldan pas 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa ni sgeg pa la sogs pas yan lag 'gyur bar byed pa'i gar stabs rnams dang ldan pas 'bar ba'o //
translated: Various means that it is blazing with the various gestures such as gracefulness and so on, which are the movements of the limbs.

original: spyi bo'i steng ni spyi gtsug go //
analyzed: spyi bo'i steng ni spyi gtsug go //
translated: The top of the head is the crown.

original: dngos po bsgom byas na zhes bya ba ni rab tu dang zhing mos pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bsam pas bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po bsgom byas na zhes bya ba ni rab tu dang zhing mos pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bsam pas bsgom pa'o //
translated: Meditating on the entity means meditating with a mind that follows faith and devotion.

original: gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gdug pa thams cad zil gyis mnan pa gang gis kyang mi thub pas gzhan gyis mi thub pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gdug pa thams cad zil gyis mnan pa gang gis kyang mi thub pas gzhan gyis mi thub pa ste /
translated: The one called Unvanquished by Others and so forth: he is unvanquished by anyone who has overcome all wickedness.

original: de nyid ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
translated: That itself is the vajra of wisdom.

original: dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The word observing has the sense of and so forth as explained.

original: spyan gsum pa zhes bya ba 'dir ldan zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: spyan gsum pa zhes bya ba 'dir ldan zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The one with three eyes: here the word endowed is understood.🔽He sits in the lotus posture,

original: rol pa'i stabs kyis padmar zhugs //
analyzed: rol pa'i stabs kyis padmar zhugs //
translated: in the manner of play.

original: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: This has been explained.

original: de lta mod kyi padma mthar byed ces bya ba'i don gyi rjes su 'brangs nas padma'i steng na tshangs pa chung ma dang bcas pa de'i steng na bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi padma mthar byed ces bya ba'i don gyi rjes su 'brangs nas padma'i steng na tshangs pa chung ma dang bcas pa de'i steng na bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs pa'o //
translated: However, following the meaning of the name Padmanarteśvara, he sits on a lotus, with Brahmā and his wife above him, and the Blessed One sits as before.

original: khro bo'i lta bas rtog par mdzad //🔽ces bya ba ni /🔽khro gnyer bsnyer bas rab tu 'jigs //
analyzed: khro bo'i lta bas rtog par mdzad // ces bya ba ni / khro gnyer bsnyer bas rab tu 'jigs //
translated: He is contemplated with a wrathful gaze.🔽He is terrifying with a frowning brow,

original: khro bo'i lta bas rab tu 'dzum //
analyzed: khro bo'i lta bas rab tu 'dzum //
translated: and he smiles with a wrathful gaze.

original: khro bo'i lta bas mnyam gzhag na //
analyzed: khro bo'i lta bas mnyam gzhag na //
translated: If he is in equipoise with the wrathful gaze,

original: khams gsum dag kyang 'jigs par byed //🔽ces bshad ba ni khro bo'i lta ba'i mtshan nyid de des gzigs par mdzad pas na /
analyzed: khams gsum dag kyang 'jigs par byed // ces bshad ba ni khro bo'i lta ba'i mtshan nyid de des gzigs par mdzad pas na /
translated: he terrifies even the three realms.🔽The characteristic of the wrathful gaze is explained as follows:🔽He is called “one who acts with the wrathful gaze”

original: khro bo'i lta bas rtog mdzad pa //
analyzed: khro bo'i lta bas rtog mdzad pa //
translated: because he looks with that.

original: zhes bya'o // ljags ni bskyod mdzad la zhes bya ba ni ljags spyod par mdzad cing 'jigs pas na ljags ni skyod par @213b mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // ljags ni bskyod mdzad la zhes bya ba ni ljags spyod par mdzad cing 'jigs pas na ljags ni skyod par @213b mdzad pa'o //
translated: “He causes the tongue to quiver” means that he causes the tongue to quiver and terrify.

original: sangs rgyas gzugs ni mang po dag / ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sku du ma dag 'phro bar byed pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gzugs ni mang po dag / ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sku du ma dag 'phro bar byed pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: “He emits many buddha forms” means that he emits many buddha bodies and so on.

original: 'phro zhing 'du bar zhes bya ba //
analyzed: 'phro zhing 'du bar zhes bya ba //
translated: “He causes them to emanate and gather”

original: nye bar mtshon pas na 'phro ba dang bsdu ba dang gnas pa dang brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: nye bar mtshon pas na 'phro ba dang bsdu ba dang gnas pa dang brtan par bya'o //
translated: means that he causes them to emanate, gather, remain, and stabilize.

original: bsgoms byas nas zhes bya ba ni 'dir thun gsum du goms par bya'o zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsgoms byas nas zhes bya ba ni 'dir thun gsum du goms par bya'o zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: “Having meditated” means that here one should meditate in three sessions.

original: rta mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la rab mchog tu gyur pa'i rta mchog thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid du dbu gsum gyi steng du 'jog par mdzad pas na rta mchog ste de nyid ni ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rta mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la rab mchog tu gyur pa'i rta mchog thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid du dbu gsum gyi steng du 'jog par mdzad pas na rta mchog ste de nyid ni ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
translated: The meaning of supreme horse and so on is this: he is the supreme horse, the best of all horses, because he is the one who places the nature of the destroyer on the three heads. He is the supreme horse, and he is the vajra of wisdom.

original: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of the words object and so on has been explained.

original: bgegs kyi gshed ces bya ba ni dngos grub ma lus pa'i bgegs su gyur pa 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: bgegs kyi gshed ces bya ba ni dngos grub ma lus pa'i bgegs su gyur pa 'joms pa'o //
translated: The meaning of executioner of obstacles is that he is the destroyer of all obstacles to the attainment of all powers.

original: me yi dkyil 'khor bzhugs zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis bskor ba'o //
analyzed: me yi dkyil 'khor bzhugs zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis bskor ba'o //
translated: The meaning of residing in the middle of a fire mandala is that he is surrounded by a blazing mandala.

original: autpala sngon po'i 'dab ma'i mdog / ces bya ba ni autpala sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu'i mdog dang gzi mdangs yod pas na de skad ces bya ba ste sku mdog sngon po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: autpala sngon po'i 'dab ma'i mdog / ces bya ba ni autpala sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu'i mdog dang gzi mdangs yod pas na de skad ces bya ba ste sku mdog sngon po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the color of a blue lotus petal is that he has the color and radiance of a blue lotus petal. He is blue-colored, is the meaning.

original: zhabs kyis bgegs ni mnan pa sta //
analyzed: zhabs kyis bgegs ni mnan pa sta //
translated: He tramples on obstacles with his feet.

original: zhes bya ba ni zhabs g-yon pas padma'i steng na tshogs kyi bdag po gnas pa gnon par mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhabs g-yon pas padma'i steng na tshogs kyi bdag po gnas pa gnon par mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is so called because he tramples on Gaṇapati, who is on a lotus, with his left foot.

original: gnyis pa padma'i steng na bzhugs //
analyzed: gnyis pa padma'i steng na bzhugs //
translated: The second one is seated on a lotus.

original: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi gnyis pa ste zhabs g-yas pa padma la 'jog par mdzad pas na bcom ldan 'das 'di yang rol pa'i stabs kyis padma la bzhugs par bsgom par bya'o zhes 'dir yang snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi gnyis pa ste zhabs g-yas pa padma la 'jog par mdzad pas na bcom ldan 'das 'di yang rol pa'i stabs kyis padma la bzhugs par bsgom par bya'o zhes 'dir yang snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The second one is the Blessed One himself, who is seated on a lotus with his right foot placed on a lotus. This Blessed One should be visualized as seated on a lotus in a dancing posture, as before.

original: ye shes mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'o //
translated: Skilled in wisdom means skilled in the wisdom of meditation.

original: bgegs thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la bgegs thams cad rnam par gzhom pa ni rnam par 'jig pa ste /
analyzed: bgegs thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la bgegs thams cad rnam par gzhom pa ni rnam par 'jig pa ste /
translated: All obstructors are destroyed means that they are annihilated.

original: des rnam par rgyal ba mnga' bas na de skad ces bya ste de nyid ni ye shes rdo rje'o //
analyzed: des rnam par rgyal ba mnga' bas na de skad ces bya ste de nyid ni ye shes rdo rje'o //
translated: He is victorious over them, and therefore he is so called. He is the vajra of wisdom.

original: de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of “having that as its object” and so forth has been explained.

original: mig g-yon zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa yo pa'o //
analyzed: mig g-yon zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa yo pa'o //
translated: The left eye is the left eye.

original: h'um gis snying ga'i phyogs kyang bkang //
analyzed: h'um gis snying ga'i phyogs kyang bkang //
translated: The heart region is filled with the syllable hum.

original: zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i phyogs na gnas pa'i yi ge h'um gi sgras lus khyab pa'o //🔽mthing shun gyi ni mdog can te //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i phyogs na gnas pa'i yi ge h'um gi sgras lus khyab pa'o // mthing shun gyi ni mdog can te //
translated: The syllable hum located in the heart region fills the body with its sound.

original: zhes bya ba ni kha dog gzhan dang shin tu ma 'dres pa'i mthing gi mdog can no //🔽thub pa ni mi dge @214a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kha dog gzhan dang shin tu ma 'dres pa'i mthing gi mdog can no // thub pa ni mi dge @214a * //
translated: The color of a blue lotus is the color of a blue lotus.

original: ba rnams rnam pa thams cad du sdom pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ba rnams rnam pa thams cad du sdom pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The sage is the one who is a sage because of his nature of restraining all that is unwholesome.

original: bgegs kyi chu mjings  zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ma rig pa'i mun pas nye bar bsags pa'i sems kyi rgyun rnam par spyod bar mdzad pas bgegs kyi chu po'i mjings  'joms pa'o //
analyzed: bgegs kyi chu mjings  zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ma rig pa'i mun pas nye bar bsags pa'i sems kyi rgyun rnam par spyod bar mdzad pas bgegs kyi chu po'i mjings  'joms pa'o //
translated: The crossing of the river of obstacles is the crossing of the river of obstacles because of the purification of the stream of consciousness that is accumulated by the darkness of nescience.

original: spyan g-yo ba ni phyogs thams cad du legs par gzigs pa la brtson pa'o //
analyzed: spyan g-yo ba ni phyogs thams cad du legs par gzigs pa la brtson pa'o //
translated: The moving eye is the eye that is intent on seeing well in all directions.

original: de nyid nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pas na 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pas na 'bar ba'o //
translated: The radiant is the one who is radiant because of being endowed with a solar orb.

original: chang pas bzung ste blta ba dang // zhes pa ni khu tshur dam du bcas pas dam du bzung ba'o //
analyzed: chang pas bzung ste blta ba dang // zhes pa ni khu tshur dam du bcas pas dam du bzung ba'o //
translated: This is holding it tightly with a clenched fist.🔽With various flowers, etc.

original: sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dus thams cad pa'i me tog sna tshogs pa chu las skyes pa dang thad las skyes pa'i mchog rnams khyad par du spel zhing bkod pas bcings shing dkris pa ste /
analyzed: sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dus thams cad pa'i me tog sna tshogs pa chu las skyes pa dang thad las skyes pa'i mchog rnams khyad par du spel zhing bkod pas bcings shing dkris pa ste /
translated: The best of all flowers, which grow in water or on land, are arranged in all seasons, and are bound and tied.

original: des rtsa bar bcings pa'i cod pan gyi dbu rgyan rin po che las byas pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya la /
analyzed: des rtsa bar bcings pa'i cod pan gyi dbu rgyan rin po che las byas pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya la /
translated: The crown ornament, which is bound at the root and is made of jewels, is called that.

original: de mnga' bas ni bcom ldan 'das mi g-yo mgon la yang de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de mnga' bas ni bcom ldan 'das mi g-yo mgon la yang de skad ces bya ste /
translated: And because he possesses it, the Blessed One Acyuta-natha is also called that.

original: dbu'i steng du dus thams cad pa'i me tog gi phreng bas dbu rgyan byas pa'o //
analyzed: dbu'i steng du dus thams cad pa'i me tog gi phreng bas dbu rgyan byas pa'o //
translated: The crown ornament is made of flower garlands of all seasons, which are placed on the head.

original: cho 'phrul chen po du ma 'phro //
analyzed: cho 'phrul chen po du ma 'phro //
translated: Many great miracles emanate.

original: zhes bya ba ni gdul bya rnams mos par byed pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gdul bya rnams mos par byed pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The phrase endowed with miracles, etc. is a verbal supplement.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du'o //
translated: As such means in such a way.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa gang dus thams cad du spyod lam rnam bzhir bsgom mo zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa gang dus thams cad du spyod lam rnam bzhir bsgom mo zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
translated: Always means at all times. The practitioner meditates in the four postures.

original: sgom par byed ces bya ba ni 'dir 'di ltar ro //
analyzed: sgom par byed ces bya ba ni 'dir 'di ltar ro //
translated: Meditates means in this way.

original: bla na med pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la chos thams cad phyin ci ma logs par khor du chud pa ni byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la chos thams cad phyin ci ma logs par khor du chud pa ni byang chub pa'o //
translated: The phrase unsurpassed enlightenment refers to the realization of all things without error.

original: de las khyad par du gyur pa gzhan med pas de nyid ni bla na med pa'o //🔽them skas la ni 'jog par 'gyur //
analyzed: de las khyad par du gyur pa gzhan med pas de nyid ni bla na med pa'o // them skas la ni 'jog par 'gyur //
translated: Since there is nothing higher than that, it is unsurpassed.

original: zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rgyun 'phags pa'i lam la rdzogs pas gnas pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rgyun 'phags pa'i lam la rdzogs pas gnas pa ste /
translated: The phrase he places his foot on the staircase means that the stream of his mind is established in the noble path.

original: 'di dag gis ni byang chub rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan to //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni byang chub rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan to //
translated: These verses show that enlightenment is to be attained by striving.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa ni sgrub pa po ma lus pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub stsol ba'i phyir sad par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa ni sgrub pa po ma lus pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub stsol ba'i phyir sad par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The one called Tathagata and so forth: the one who acts in accordance with the word of all Tathagatas is the one who awakens, because he bestows the powers that are desired by all adepts.

original: de la mi g-yo ba ni mi 'gul ba'o //
analyzed: de la mi g-yo ba ni mi 'gul ba'o //
translated: There, unmoving means unwavering.

original: ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gang yin pa de la des rnam par bsgyings pa ni sems can ma lus pa'i don rdzogs par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gang yin pa de la des rnam par bsgyings pa ni sems can ma lus pa'i don rdzogs par mdzad pa'o //
translated: Wisdom is that of the Tathagatas. Playing in that is the complete fulfillment of the aims of all sentient beings.

original: @214b de rnam par rol pa mnga' bas na bcom ldan 'das mi g-yo ba la de skad ces bya ste de nyid rdo rje'o //
analyzed: @214b de rnam par rol pa mnga' bas na bcom ldan 'das mi g-yo ba la de skad ces bya ste de nyid rdo rje'o //
translated: Since he possesses that play, the Blessed One is called unmoving. That itself is the vajra.

original: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //🔽ming ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ste //
analyzed: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to // ming ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ste //
translated: The meaning of object and so forth has been explained.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Namely, Kamadeva,🔽is known as

original: takki'i 'dod pa yin par grags //
analyzed: takki'i 'dod pa yin par grags //
translated: the desire of Takki.

original: zhes gsungs pas na 'dod pa ma lus pa'i bdag por gyur pas na mtshan de ltar bsgrags zhes tshig 'og ma dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas na 'dod pa ma lus pa'i bdag por gyur pas na mtshan de ltar bsgrags zhes tshig 'og ma dang sbyar ro //
translated: Thus, because he is the lord of all desires, he is proclaimed by that name.

original: dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa'i //
analyzed: dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa'i //
translated: He is adorned with a crown jewel of the Buddhas.

original: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan gyi cod pan dang ldan pa ste gtso bo'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //🔽dpral bar khro gnyer bsdus mdzad pa //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan gyi cod pan dang ldan pa ste gtso bo'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o // dpral bar khro gnyer bsdus mdzad pa //
translated: He is adorned with a crown jewel of the Buddhas, endowed with the diadem of the Buddha Akshobhya.🔽He has a frown on his forehead.

original: zhes bya ba ni dpral ba ni smin ma'i bar du khro gnyer bsdus par mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpral ba ni smin ma'i bar du khro gnyer bsdus par mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He has a frown on his forehead, between his eyebrows.🔽He is blazing,

original: 'bar ba ste zhes bya ba ni dngos po khyad par can dang ldan pas de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba ste zhes bya ba ni dngos po khyad par can dang ldan pas de skad ces bya'o //
translated: because he is endowed with a special substance.🔽He has a red mandala,

original: dkyil 'khor dmar po zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dmar po zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: a sun mandala.

original: 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya ni 'og nas 'chad do //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya ni 'og nas 'chad do //
translated: The mudra of the King of Desire will be explained below.🔽He has a dancing gait,

original: rol pa'i stabs ni rol pa'i stang stabs mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: rol pa'i stabs ni rol pa'i stang stabs mdzad pa'o //
translated: he has a dancing gait.

original: 'og gi bgegs la sdang bar mdzad //
analyzed: 'og gi bgegs la sdang bar mdzad //
translated: He is hostile to the obstructors below.

original: ces bya ba ni 'og gi bgegs rnams skrag par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'og gi bgegs rnams skrag par mdzad pa'o //
translated: This means that he terrifies the obstructors below.

original: sangs rgyas spros pas kun du khyab //
analyzed: sangs rgyas spros pas kun du khyab //
translated: He is pervaded by the emanations of the Buddhas.

original: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi khro bas kun du 'khrigs pas lus la khyab pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi khro bas kun du 'khrigs pas lus la khyab pa'o //
translated: This means that his body is pervaded by the smoke of the wrath of the Buddhas.

original: bla med ye shes thob bya'i phyir //
analyzed: bla med ye shes thob bya'i phyir //
translated: In order to attain the unsurpassed intuition,

original: zhes bya ba ni thams cad la mchog tu gyur pa'i ye shes thob pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thams cad la mchog tu gyur pa'i ye shes thob pa'i don du'o //
translated: This means in order to attain the intuition which is supreme in all ways.

original: ting nge 'dzin bzang po zhes bya ba ni sems mchog tu rtse gcig pa thob bas so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin bzang po zhes bya ba ni sems mchog tu rtse gcig pa thob bas so //
translated: The excellent meditative concentration is the attainment of the supreme one-pointedness of mind.

original: snying po thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs thams cad kyi snying po ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: snying po thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs thams cad kyi snying po ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The essence of all, etc. The essence of all, i.e., of the Buddhas, Vajra-Holders, etc., is nondual intuition.

original: de thams cad nas 'gugs pa ni 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: de thams cad nas 'gugs pa ni 'dren pa'o //
translated: He draws forth all of that, i.e., he leads it forth.

original: de rnam par rgyal ba sta gdug pa rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i mtshan nyid mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de rnam par rgyal ba sta gdug pa rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i mtshan nyid mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is called the Victorious One because he possesses the characteristic of overpowering the wicked.

original: de nyid ye shes rdo rje ste //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes rdo rje ste //
translated: That is the vajra of intuition.

original: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of “object” and so forth has been explained.

original: sku ni sprin sngon 'dra ba ste //
analyzed: sku ni sprin sngon 'dra ba ste //
translated: His body is like a blue cloud.

original: zhes bya ba na sku sprin sngon po dang 'dra bar sngo ba mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba na sku sprin sngon po dang 'dra bar sngo ba mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: His body is blue like a blue cloud, hence he is so called.

original: dbu rgyan la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs //
analyzed: dbu rgyan la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs //
translated: The Buddhas reside in his crown.

original: zhes bya ba ni cod pan la mi bskyod pa 'jog pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni cod pan la mi bskyod pa 'jog pa'o //
translated: Akṣobhya is placed in the crown.

original: rol stabs mdzad ces bya ba ni rol pa'i stang stabs mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: rol stabs mdzad ces bya ba ni rol pa'i stang stabs mdzad pa'o //
translated: He performs the dance of play.

original: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The mandala is the sun mandala.

original: @215a * // sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis bskul ba'i //
analyzed: @215a * // sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis bskul ba'i //
translated: The Buddhas are urged by the intuition of union.

original: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sbyor ba'o //
translated: The pledge seal is the union.

original: de'i ye shes ni 'khyud pa la sogs pa ste gnas skabs der ci rigs par rigs lngar bzhugs pa'i lha thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i ye shes ni 'khyud pa la sogs pa ste gnas skabs der ci rigs par rigs lngar bzhugs pa'i lha thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa nyid de /
translated: His intuition is the embrace and so forth, and at that time, in whatever way is appropriate, it is the purity of the ecstasy of all the deities residing in the five clans.

original: des bskul bar so sor rig pas rab tu dga' ba'i bdag nyid can bdag gir mdzad ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: des bskul bar so sor rig pas rab tu dga' ba'i bdag nyid can bdag gir mdzad ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: The I that is the nature of supreme joy is made one's own by the awareness of the urging.

original: gzhan dag ni lha dang gnyis su med pa'i nga rgyal gyi bdag nyid can gyi sbyor ba bsgom pa ni ye shes kyis bskul ba'o zhes 'dod do //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni lha dang gnyis su med pa'i nga rgyal gyi bdag nyid can gyi sbyor ba bsgom pa ni ye shes kyis bskul ba'o zhes 'dod do //
translated: Others believe that the meditation on the yoga that has the nature of the identity of non-dual with the deity is the urging by means of gnosis.

original: bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The meditation is to be performed is the remainder of the verse.

original: dbang bdag brdeg pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dbang bdag ni lha chen po'o //
analyzed: dbang bdag brdeg pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dbang bdag ni lha chen po'o //
translated: The lord of the gods is Maheśvara.

original: de la brdeg pa ston par gyur pa la sogs pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal gsal bar mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: de la brdeg pa ston par gyur pa la sogs pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal gsal bar mdzad pa ste /
translated: The manifestation of the identity of the teacher etc. is the clear manifestation of the pride.

original: de'i ye shes gang yin pa de rnam par rgyal ba 'di la mnga' bas dbyig sngon la de skad ces bya ste de nyid rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes gang yin pa de rnam par rgyal ba 'di la mnga' bas dbyig sngon la de skad ces bya ste de nyid rdo rje'o //
translated: Since the gnosis of that is present in this Victor, the blue sapphire is so-called; it is the vajra.

original: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don bshad zin to //
analyzed: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of the objective supports etc. has been explained.

original: mig dmar skra 'bar gyen du brdzes //
analyzed: mig dmar skra 'bar gyen du brdzes //
translated: Red-eyed, with hair blazing and standing on end,

original: zhes pa ni mig dmar po mnga' bas na mig dmar ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mig dmar po mnga' bas na mig dmar ro //
translated: He is called “red-eyed” because he has red eyes.

original: yang de nyid ni dbu skra 'bar zhing 'od dang ldan pas gyen du brdzes pa gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: yang de nyid ni dbu skra 'bar zhing 'od dang ldan pas gyen du brdzes pa gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is also called “with hair standing on end” because his hair is erect, blazing and radiant.

original: padma la bzhugs 'gying bag can //
analyzed: padma la bzhugs 'gying bag can //
translated: He is on a lotus, with a proud gait.

original: zhes bya ba ni padma'i gdan gyi steng na khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis stang stabs dang bcas pas bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padma'i gdan gyi steng na khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis stang stabs dang bcas pas bzhugs pa'o //
translated: He is on a lotus seat, with a proud gait, with a wrathful demeanor.

original: dran po ni drag po'i las mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dran po ni drag po'i las mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is “fierce” because he performs fierce actions.

original: tsham dam bcas pas gtor zhes bya ba ni tsam ngam dang bcas shing rol pa'i stang stabs zhes bya ba dang khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis bzhugs pas tsham dam bcas zhes bya ste stang stabs des bgegs rnam 'thor zhing skrod par byed pa bskyed pas de skad ces🔽bya'o // phyogs bcu'i zhes bya ba ni rang rang gi phyogs su'o //
analyzed: tsham dam bcas pas gtor zhes bya ba ni tsam ngam dang bcas shing rol pa'i stang stabs zhes bya ba dang khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis bzhugs pas tsham dam bcas zhes bya ste stang stabs des bgegs rnam 'thor zhing skrod par byed pa bskyed pas de skad ces bya'o // phyogs bcu'i zhes bya ba ni rang rang gi phyogs su'o //
translated: He is “with a threatening gesture” because he scatters and drives away the obstructors with a threatening gesture, with a wrathful demeanor.

original: 'bar ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor //
analyzed: 'bar ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor //
translated: He is “surrounded by blazing ones” because he is surrounded by blazing ones in the ten directions, in their respective directions.

original: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pas de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pas de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The sun is so called because it is endowed with a circle of light.

original: sprin zhes bya ba ni 'dir ldan pa'i tshig tu shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sprin zhes bya ba ni 'dir ldan pa'i tshig tu shes par bya'o //
translated: The cloud is to be understood here as a compound word.

original: sgom pa'i mchog gis zhes bya ba sgom pa'i mchog thob pas so //
analyzed: sgom pa'i mchog gis zhes bya ba sgom pa'i mchog thob pas so //
translated: The best of meditators is one who has attained the best of meditations.

original: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni 'dir de bzhin du bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni 'dir de bzhin du bsgom pa'o //
translated: The meditation is the meditation on that.

original: 'chol ba zhes bya ba la 'chol @215b ba'i rgyud las bshad pa'i kun du spyod pa la ni 'chol ba zhes bya ba'i sgrar brjod do //
analyzed: 'chol ba zhes bya ba la 'chol @215b ba'i rgyud las bshad pa'i kun du spyod pa la ni 'chol ba zhes bya ba'i sgrar brjod do //
translated: The mixture is the conduct explained in the Tantra of the Mixture.

original: de'i ye shes ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar rtogs pa'o //
translated: Its wisdom is the realization of natural luminosity.

original: de'i stobs ni thogs pa med pa'i nus pa'o //
analyzed: de'i stobs ni thogs pa med pa'i nus pa'o //
translated: Its power is the unobstructed ability.

original: des rnam par rgyal ba ni de dang 'dra bas rjes su 'gro ba'i sems can med pas na khro bo stobs po che la de skad ces bya ste de nyid rdo rje'o //
analyzed: des rnam par rgyal ba ni de dang 'dra bas rjes su 'gro ba'i sems can med pas na khro bo stobs po che la de skad ces bya ste de nyid rdo rje'o //
translated: By that, he is victorious, and since there are no sentient beings who follow him, he is called the Great Wrathful One, and he is the vajra.

original: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of object and so forth has been explained.

original: sku gsum ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: sku gsum ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas de skad ces bya ste /
translated: Possessing the three bodies means that he is the embodiment of the three bodies, the essence of the vajra body, speech, and mind.

original: thams cad la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand all the other [deities] in the same way.

original: 'od bzang ba zhes bya ba ni 'od dmar po'o //
analyzed: 'od bzang ba zhes bya ba ni 'od dmar po'o //
translated: Good light means red light.

original: 'od ma gang 'od kyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: 'od ma gang 'od kyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: The light rays that adorn him are the light rays of the five colors.

original: zhes bya ba ni kun nas 'od zer mdog gang gis sku rab tu mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kun nas 'od zer mdog gang gis sku rab tu mdzes pa'o //
translated: The light rays of whatever color beautify his body.

original: ngos na lha mo rab bzhugs pa //🔽zhes bya ba ni ngos gnyis na gsang ba chen po'i de kho na nyid lnga'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ngos na lha mo rab bzhugs pa // zhes bya ba ni ngos gnyis na gsang ba chen po'i de kho na nyid lnga'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o //
translated: The goddesses who stand on the sides are the four consorts of the Tathagata.

original: rigs kyi yum ni bzhi po rnams //
analyzed: rigs kyi yum ni bzhi po rnams //
translated: The four consorts of the Tathagata are the four clans.

original: zhes bya ba ni la la ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa yin par 'dod la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni la la ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa yin par 'dod la /
translated: Some assert that they are Vajra-dhatvi-svara and so on,

original: gzhan dag ni spyan la sogs pa yin no zhes zer mod kyi de gnyis las phyogs snga ma ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni spyan la sogs pa yin no zhes zer mod kyi de gnyis las phyogs snga ma ni mi rigs so //
translated: but others say that they are Locana and so on. Of these two positions, the former is incorrect.

original: de dang ldan zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The phrase endowed with is a verbal suffix.

original: phyag rgya 'di dag kyang gang gi phyir sngar bshad mod kyi 'on kyang bskyed pa'i rim pa la dgongs pa nyid kyis na gtso bo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir yang phyag rgya 'di dag nye bar dgod pa mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di dag kyang gang gi phyir sngar bshad mod kyi 'on kyang bskyed pa'i rim pa la dgongs pa nyid kyis na gtso bo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir yang phyag rgya 'di dag nye bar dgod pa mdzad pa yin no //
translated: Although these seals have already been explained, they are again set forth as principal ones, because they are intended for the stage of generation.

original: rjes chags zhes bya ba ni rjes su dgyes pa'i bdag nyid can yin pas so //
analyzed: rjes chags zhes bya ba ni rjes su dgyes pa'i bdag nyid can yin pas so //
translated: The phrase affectionate means having a nature of affection.

original: spros bcas dga' ston yin zhes bya ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i spro ba dang bcas pa'i dga' ston te /
analyzed: spros bcas dga' ston yin zhes bya ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i spro ba dang bcas pa'i dga' ston te /
translated: The phrase festive with elaboration means having the elaboration of a universal monarch's festival.

original: kun du dga' ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: kun du dga' ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which is a universal rejoicing is called that.

original: 'dir lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa'o //
translated: Here the goddesses have two arms.

original: gtsug tor 'od zer lnga pa can //
analyzed: gtsug tor 'od zer lnga pa can //
translated: The uṣṇīṣa has five light rays.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dir de nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dir de nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Here that is to be understood.

original: kun du 'khor lo'i phreng bar ldan //
analyzed: kun du 'khor lo'i phreng bar ldan //
translated: The wheel garland is all around.

original: zhes bya / ba ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du'o //
analyzed: zhes bya / ba ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du'o //
translated: Outside the circle of light.

original: 'khor lo'i bar na rdo rje gnas //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i bar na rdo rje gnas //
translated: In the middle of the wheel is a vajra,

original: 'od zer phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: 'od zer phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned with a garland of light rays.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phreng ba'i nang du 'od kyi 'khor byas pas rjes su 'brel ba'i rdo rje phreng ba'i 'od zer gyi rnam pa can pas brgyan pa ste /🔽nye bar mtshon pa 'dis na de'i nang du rin po che dang @216a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phreng ba'i nang du 'od kyi 'khor byas pas rjes su 'brel ba'i rdo rje phreng ba'i 'od zer gyi rnam pa can pas brgyan pa ste / nye bar mtshon pa 'dis na de'i nang du rin po che dang @216a * //
translated: This means that the wheel is adorned with the form of light rays from the garland of vajras, which is formed by the garland of light inside the vajra.🔽By this example, it should be understood that it is also adorned with garlands of jewels,

original: padma dang / autpala'i phreng bas kyang brgyan par shes par bya'o //🔽byang chub snying po don gnyer ba //
analyzed: padma dang / autpala'i phreng bas kyang brgyan par shes par bya'o // byang chub snying po don gnyer ba //
translated: lotuses, and utpalas inside it.🔽Striving for the essence of enlightenment,

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi snying po mngon par 'dod pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi snying po mngon par 'dod pas so //
translated: means by desiring the essence of enlightenment.

original: 'dod pa thob ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed do //
analyzed: 'dod pa thob ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed do //
translated: Having attained the desired goal, means that he accomplishes all mundane and supramundane perfections.

original: byang chub snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la byang chub kyi snying po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: byang chub snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la byang chub kyi snying po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The essence of enlightenment, etc. The essence of enlightenment is the Tathagata's gnosis.

original: des gdul bya'i skye bo'i bsam pa rnam pa thams cad du rdzogs par byed cing brgyan pa dang spud par mdzad pas na byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyis brgyan pa ste 'khor los sgyur pa'o //
analyzed: des gdul bya'i skye bo'i bsam pa rnam pa thams cad du rdzogs par byed cing brgyan pa dang spud par mdzad pas na byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyis brgyan pa ste 'khor los sgyur pa'o //
translated: Since it completely fulfills, adorns, and decks the thoughts of the disciples, it is the ornament of all the seats of enlightenment, the universal monarch.

original: de nyid kyi ye shes na 'khor lo'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na ye shes 'khor lo'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi ye shes na 'khor lo'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na ye shes 'khor lo'i rdo rje'o //
translated: Since that very intuition is the nature of the wheel, it is the vajra of the wheel of intuition.

original: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The object, etc., have been explained.

original: gong du de dag la brten nas ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las nges par 'byung pa'i gsang sngags bye ba phrag du ma gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don de nyid rim bzhin du bstan pa yin te gsang sngags dam pa'i tshogs dang lha rnams tha mi dad
analyzed: gong du de dag la brten nas ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las nges par 'byung pa'i gsang sngags bye ba phrag du ma gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don de nyid rim bzhin du bstan pa yin te gsang sngags dam pa'i tshogs dang lha rnams tha mi dad
translated: Above, it was said that many millions of secret spells arise from the special meditative concentration based on those, and the meaning of that is being taught in order, since the assembly of the best secret spells is not differentiated from the deities.

original: par gzhag pa yin pas ci rigs par bsgrub pa'i phyir 'khor los sgyur ba dang por nye bar bkod pa yin no //
analyzed: par gzhag pa yin pas ci rigs par bsgrub pa'i phyir 'khor los sgyur ba dang por nye bar bkod pa yin no //
translated: In order to accomplish them as appropriate, the universal monarch is first presented.

original: sku gsum zhes bya ba ni rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i sku gsum dang ldan pas na de skad ces gsungs so //🔽b'i dza p'u ra ne'u le can //🔽zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa na b'i dza p'u ra'o //
analyzed: sku gsum zhes bya ba ni rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i sku gsum dang ldan pas na de skad ces gsungs so // b'i dza p'u ra ne'u le can // zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa na b'i dza p'u ra'o //
translated: She has a mongoose in her right hand.

original: g-yon pa na ne'u le'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa na ne'u le'o //
translated: She has a mongoose in her left hand.

original: ngos la rgyan rnams thams cad kyis //🔽brgyan pa'i gnod spyin mo bzhi dag / ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: ngos la rgyan rnams thams cad kyis // brgyan pa'i gnod spyin mo bzhi dag / ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: She is adorned with all the ornaments on her body.🔽The four yakshini goddesses are adorned with all the ornaments on their bodies.

original: gzhan dag ni 'di dag phyogs rnam pa bzhi na gnas so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni 'di dag phyogs rnam pa bzhi na gnas so zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say that these goddesses reside in the four directions.🔽The vajra nectar is in her hands.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi lag nas pas //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi lag nas pas // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The vajra nectar is in her hands.

original: a'a: dang h'um las byung ba yi //🔽zla ba rdo rje lag par bsam //
analyzed: a'a: dang h'um las byung ba yi // zla ba rdo rje lag par bsam //
translated: The moon and vajra arise from A and Hum.🔽The moon and vajra arise from A and Hum.🔽The moon and vajra arise from A and Hum.

original: yi ge aom las gdu bu ni //🔽ser po mkhrig mar bsam par bya //🔽bam ni zla ba'i mdog 'dra ba //🔽de las bdud rtsi'i char rab 'bab //
analyzed: yi ge aom las gdu bu ni // ser po mkhrig mar bsam par bya // bam ni zla ba'i mdog 'dra ba // de las bdud rtsi'i char rab 'bab //
translated: The moon and vajra arise from A and Hum.🔽The moon and vajra arise from A and Hum.🔽The moon and vajra arise from A and Hum.

analyzed: dri med ser mor mngon phyogs pa /🔽mkhas pas bum pa bzhin du blta //

analyzed: 'di ltar spyi bor cho ga bzhin // mkhas pas chu yi spyin blugs brgya //
translated: In this way, on the head, according to the rite,🔽the wise one should properly offer

original: nyin re zhing ni legs par dbul //
analyzed: nyin re zhing ni legs par dbul //

original: rin po che zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rin po che ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rin po che zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rin po che ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: spyin pa ni sems can thams cad la stobs pa ste de lta bu'i rin po che'i char 'bebs pas na de skad ces bya'o //

analyzed: de nyid spyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi sprin dang ldan pas na /
