analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rjes su nye bar gyur par shes par bya'o //
translated: one should understand that it is close at hand.

original: sku gsum 'phro ba dang ldan pa //
analyzed: sku gsum 'phro ba dang ldan pa //
translated: Possessing the emanation of the three bodies

original: zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs te gsum gyi tshul spro ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ba ste bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs te gsum gyi tshul spro ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ba ste bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: is the method of the three bodies, speech, and mind. That which emanates is so called. Meditation is the remainder.🔽The ocean of the vase and so on

original: bum pa'i mtsho dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sbyor ba gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: bum pa'i mtsho dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sbyor ba gsungs pa ste /
translated: teaches the application.

original: mngal 'dzag pa dang bu mi 'cho ba dang // mngal mi chags pa dang / mngal nyams pa rnams so so 'brang ma chen mo'i dkyil 'khor 'dir bcug la de zhes bya ba 'dis bsam mo zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: mngal 'dzag pa dang bu mi 'cho ba dang // mngal mi chags pa dang / mngal nyams pa rnams so so 'brang ma chen mo'i dkyil 'khor 'dir bcug la de zhes bya ba 'dis bsam mo zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: and those who have a miscarriage, or who have a stillborn child, or who are barren, or who have a defective womb, should be made to enter this great protection mandala, and they should be made to think with this mantra.🔽The rest is self-evident.

original: skal ngan ni zhes bya ba ni sdig pa'i lus byung ba'o //🔽sdig ba @235a * //
analyzed: skal ngan ni zhes bya ba ni sdig pa'i lus byung ba'o // sdig ba @235a * //
translated: Unfortunate means having an evil body.

original: dral bas dral nas kyang //
analyzed: dral bas dral nas kyang //
translated: Having been torn by the evil,

original: zhes bya ba ni sdig pa dral ba'i sngags phyag rgya dang bcas pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sdig pa dral ba'i sngags phyag rgya dang bcas pas so //
translated: means by the evil-tearing mantra together with the mudra.

original: de la 'di ni sngags dang phyag rgya'o //🔽rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
analyzed: de la 'di ni sngags dang phyag rgya'o // rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
translated: Here is the mantra and mudra.🔽Having made the vajra bond,

original: gung mo gnyi ga sbyar nas su //
analyzed: gung mo gnyi ga sbyar nas su //
translated: the two middle fingers should be joined,

original: tha ma bzhi ni rtse mo sbyar //
analyzed: tha ma bzhi ni rtse mo sbyar //
translated: and the tips of the four [other] fingers should be joined.

original: sdig pa 'dzoms par grags pa yin //
analyzed: sdig pa 'dzoms par grags pa yin //
translated: This is known as the evil-tearing [mudra].

original: zhes gsungs pa ni sdigs pa dral ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa ni sdigs pa dral ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudra for tearing the evil.

original: aom badzra p'a ni bi spho ta ya sarba aa p'a bandha n'a ni pra mo kasha ya ga ti bhya sarba satv'a mam /
analyzed: aom badzra p'a ni bi spho ta ya sarba aa p'a bandha n'a ni pra mo kasha ya ga ti bhya sarba satv'a mam /
translated: Oṃ vajra-pāṇi viśphoṭaya sarvāpāyabandhanāni pramukha-gatībhyaḥ sarva-sattvānām.

original: sarba ta th'a ga t'a badzra sa ma ya trat /
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga t'a badzra sa ma ya trat /
translated: Sarva-tathagata-vajra-samaya-trat.

original: ces bya ba ni sngags so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught:

original: so so 'brang ma chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bris la /
analyzed: so so 'brang ma chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bris la /
translated: Draw the mandala of Mahapratisara just as it is.🔽A woman who is not having a child or whose womb is damaged should enter the mandala.

original: bud med bu mi 'tsho ba'am mngal nyams par dkyil 'khor du bcug la rig pa'i dbang bskur ba byin la dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor du bkug ste bzhag nas /
analyzed: bud med bu mi 'tsho ba'am mngal nyams par dkyil 'khor du bcug la rig pa'i dbang bskur ba byin la dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor du bkug ste bzhag nas /
translated: Having given the empowerment of the knowledge consorts, summon the mandala of the empowerment and place it there.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i sdig pa rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis phyung la sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis yang dag par dral te /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i sdig pa rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis phyung la sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis yang dag par dral te /
translated: As explained, extract the sin with the vajra noose mudra and mantra, and having extracted the sin with the sin-extracting mudra and mantra,

original: so so 'brang ma chen mo'i skur rnal 'byor ma chen mo bsams la sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa de'i lugs la 'dzam pa'i gzugs can du bzhugs par bsams la dbang bskur ba'i cho gas bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: so so 'brang ma chen mo'i skur rnal 'byor ma chen mo bsams la sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa de'i lugs la 'dzam pa'i gzugs can du bzhugs par bsams la dbang bskur ba'i cho gas bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: imagine the great yoginis in the form of Mahapratisara. Imagine the buddhas, Vajradhara, and so forth residing in the form of the world in her womb, and empower with the water of the vase through the rite of empowerment.

original: mngal thams cad ces bya ba la bud med thams cad kyi mngal des rnam par gzigs pas brtan par byed pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de so so 'brang zhing tshor bar byed pas bcom ldan 'das ma de la de skad ces bya ste de nyid rnam par
analyzed: mngal thams cad ces bya ba la bud med thams cad kyi mngal des rnam par gzigs pas brtan par byed pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de so so 'brang zhing tshor bar byed pas bcom ldan 'das ma de la de skad ces bya ste de nyid rnam par
translated: The one called all wombs is the one who, by seeing all wombs of all women, stabilizes the gnosis that is felt by each one.

original: rgyal ba'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The Blessed Lady is so called because she is the vajra of victory.

original: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of the words object and so forth has been explained.

original: nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nor gyi rgyun ni mngon par 'dod pa'i rin po che'i rgyun yang dag par 'dzin cing sems can so so'i rgyud la mi g-yo bar byed pas nor gyi rgyun la de skad ces bya ste de nyid ye shes
analyzed: nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nor gyi rgyun ni mngon par 'dod pa'i rin po che'i rgyun yang dag par 'dzin cing sems can so so'i rgyud la mi g-yo bar byed pas nor gyi rgyun la de skad ces bya ste de nyid ye shes
translated: The one called stream of wealth is the one who, by holding the stream of desired jewels and making it unmoving in the individual continuums of sentient beings, is called the stream of wealth.🔽 That itself is the gnosis vajra.

original: rdo rje'o // dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje'o // dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The words object and so forth are as before.

original: bcom ldan 'das nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sogs pa'i sgra ste de bas na dbul ba rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa yongs su gzung ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sogs pa'i sgra ste de bas na dbul ba rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa yongs su gzung ngo //
translated: The Blessed One, the continuous wealth, the word called is a word of inclusion, therefore, the complete destruction of poverty and so on are included.

original: de bas na 'di ltar mtshan rnams zhes bya ba tshig mang po la smos pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'di ltar mtshan rnams zhes bya ba tshig mang po la smos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said in this way: the names is a plural word.

original: ba'i zhes bya ba ni yi ge ba las bsam par bya se bshad ma thag pa'i man ngag gzhug par gyur pa ji lta ba bzhin du @235b bsams la rin po che spro bar bya'o zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: ba'i zhes bya ba ni yi ge ba las bsam par bya se bshad ma thag pa'i man ngag gzhug par gyur pa ji lta ba bzhin du @235b bsams la rin po che spro bar bya'o zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The word and so on should be connected to the end of the verse, meaning having contemplated in accordance with the just explained introduction of the instruction, one should emanate the jewels.

original: de la khyim gyi phyogs dben pa zhig tu bcom ldan 'das ma ras ris la sogs par spyan drang ba la sogs par spyan drang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rdzogs par byas la khyim der tshul khrims rnam par dag cing
analyzed: de la khyim gyi phyogs dben pa zhig tu bcom ldan 'das ma ras ris la sogs par spyan drang ba la sogs par spyan drang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rdzogs par byas la khyim der tshul khrims rnam par dag cing
translated: There, in a secluded place in the house, having completed all the rituals of inviting and so on of the Blessed One's painting and so on just as they are, in that house, with pure moral discipline,

original: dge ba phun sum tshogs pa'i bud med gtso mo mchod pa la sogs pa byed du bcug ni khyim yang dag par 'byor par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dge ba phun sum tshogs pa'i bud med gtso mo mchod pa la sogs pa byed du bcug ni khyim yang dag par 'byor par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that a woman who is a chief of perfect virtue will cause the household to be prosperous if she is made to perform worship and so forth.
